channel.title: Ggplo2 on Will Carcamo
channel.description: Recent content in Ggplo2 on Will Carcamo

item.title: Special ggplot2 Variables
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) Stat Geoms Generate Data # Load tidyverse library(tidyverse) # Random Variables x1 <- floor(runif(100, 1, 35)) y1 <- floor(runif(100, 1, 15)) # Data.frame dat <- data.frame(x1, y1) # Make it tidy Data dat <- dat %>% gather(key = "Variable", value = "Value") Blank Boxplot blank_boxplot <- ggplot(dat, aes(x = Variable, y = Value)) + geom_boxplot(aes(color = Variable)) + scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 35, 5)) + scale_color_manual(values = c("#295D6E", "#FDA52E")) + coord_flip() + theme_classic() + theme(axis.
